Author: topex.io
Title: ✅[ANN][ICO] TOPEX.IO -trading platform with profit distribution to token holders
Body: As a CEO of Topex.io I would like to thank all investors and bounty campaign participants for the trust you put in our project.  ✅ We have finished the ICO stage!   TPX token public sale and Bounty campaign are officially closed. Topex.io raised 85,93 ETH but unfortunately haven't reached softcap. Ethereum will be returned to all ICO contributors, TPX tokens will be withdrawn from their wallets. We have recorded and counted all bounty and airdrop campaign participants, but awards for bounty campaign and airdrop campaign will not be distributed. All TPX tokens will be minted(total supply) and will be stored in founder wallets for further usage.   We will continue get private KYC investments through a form on the Topex.io website. Send your investment request and we will send you all details about current status. Topex.io still save softcap and if it will be reached, all bounty and airdrop participants will be awarded.   Follow us in official Twitter account and Telegram channel for news. Thanks!

Author: crevbi
Title: ✅[ANN][ICO] TOPEX.IO -trading platform with profit distribution to token holders
Body: Charts from TradingView on Topex.io  When it came to choosing a supplier of trading charts for our platform, the Topex.io project team did not doubt for a minute. The choice fell on the charts from TradingView.  There are many analogues on the market, but all of them for one reason or another do not fit. For example, such problems as you can’t see what happened to the price an hour ago, there is no possibility to use different indicators, trading charts are not scaled and other.  TradingView is intuitive for beginners and is a powerful tool for advanced investors. Here you will find everything you need, whether it’s viewing the latest stock quotes, or analyzing the pattern of prices using scripts.  https://medium.com/@topex/charts-from-tradingview-on-topex-io-342e20c79866

Author: Gimer
Title: ✅[ANN][ICO] TOPEX.IO -trading platform with profit distribution to token holders
Body: How did this all start?  The development of electronic money began in 2008 and a little later the development of exchanges for their exchange.  The idea was for such an innovative system to be independent of the power of the world, the government, state banks, and to be reliably protected.  As everyone knows, when the bitcoin price appeared on the exchanges, it was no more than$ 0.06, but by November 2011 it exceeded the half-dollar mark. Gradually, consumer confidence in bitcoin has grown, began to appear a new alternative of electronic crypto-currencies and tokens.  At the moment, there are already a huge number of them, including 100% useful token of the trading platform - Topex.  This digital asset will become a part of the platform of the unique trading platform Topex.  The platform with a simple and user-friendly interface is securely protected and secured by data security.  Quickly, join us! Be successful and fulfill all your dreams right now!  https://topex.io

Author: Gimer
Title: ✅[ANN][ICO] TOPEX.IO -trading platform with profit distribution to token holders
Body: Market review — Capitalisation and Exchanges. Over recent years, the volume of trade in the cryptocurrency market has increased several times, at the same time the total market capitalisation of crypto-active assets increases significantly every day. Bitcoin and Ethereum represent a significant part of the overall market, but the cost of other crypto-assets is skyrocketing, along with their number. In the last year, market capitalisation of Bitcoin has fallen to almost 55% and the market has many competitors able to take its place now.    Read more: https://medium.com/@topex/market-analysis-713f6ab6f9ec

Author: Makleyhill
Title: ✅[ANN][ICO] TOPEX.IO -trading platform with profit distribution to token holders
Body: Topex.io token and public sale One of the fundamental aspects of any cryptocurrency is a token, which is a cryptocurrency analogue of the company’s shares. Topex Token (TPX) favorably differs from other tokens in its one hundred percent return, which is due to a simple and affordable system. TPX brings profit to holders due to the commission charged by the exchange when making transactions and distributing it among token holders.  TPX will be available for sale during the initial coin offering (ICO), which will start 19 september 2018. During the ICO for 1ETH will be awarded 5000 tokens TPX. Each stage of the sale implies an additional bonus. https://medium.com/@topex/topex-io-token-and-public-sale-49197aa39378

Author: adjiadjo
Title: ✅[ANN][ICO] TOPEX.IO -trading platform with profit distribution to token holders
Body: is it really an utility token? your talking about profit sharing to token holder, i though it supposed to be security token thing when it comes to profit sharing or dividend

Author: Gimer
Title: ✅[ANN][ICO] TOPEX.IO -trading platform with profit distribution to token holders
Body: From our point of view TPX is a utility token as it will has some sort of use or utility within the Topex platform such as: compensations, voting, subscribing, profit share, etc.. From the regulators point of view all tokens are security tokens as they got profit ether from speculation or from dividends. As it will be used only to get access to our platform services only we will be on the side of utility, not security.

Author: topex.io
Title: ✅[ANN][ICO] TOPEX.IO -trading platform with profit distribution to token holders
Body: It is in development, team has been working on technical requirements. Check our roadmap and the whitepaper to see what features will be on the platform.  Quote from: zhouxianli on August 14, 2018, 07:12:21 PM Trade commission of 0.2% is a constant indicator? Or in the future the size of the commission can increase?  0.2% is basic commission, depends on trading volume commission can be lowered. Plus TPX utility token holders can pay commissions in tokens, get profit, compensation for losses.  Quote from: GoodForGood on August 14, 2018, 07:20:42 PM I want to know more about the data protection system. White paper consists of 18 sheets, is it planned to expand or improve it?  Security of the platform is in the top of our priority tasks. As we mentioned in the whitepaper it will use neural network solution that check activity behaviors on every levels: users, data, network, even physical access to the equipment. It sound to complicated but allow eliminate threats from the beginning.  Quote from: Malberty on August 14, 2018, 07:26:39 PM Great project, I wish you success. I have a question, is the ETH price decrease strongly reflected on the investment collection?  Thank you! We hope this situation on the market will help. Less entry point more you will get when project starts.

Author: topex.io
Title: ✅[ANN][ICO] TOPEX.IO -trading platform with profit distribution to token holders
Body: As you know there are many exchange platforms around. Some of them big, some of them small. All of their business models are similar  - get profit from trade commissions. 0.2% is basic in the most cases. 0.2% is the profit that goes to owners. It can be millions, depends on daily trading volume. Owners spend this profit for support, development, salary, etc...  0.2% goes to owners 0.2% goes to owners..  you jealous, right ?  Remember that...  What we offer is to share this 0.2% platform profit between TPX token holders!  0.2% goes to TPX token holders 0.2% goes to TPX token holders..  see the difference?  You can invest in the platform development and get profit every day when we start running! The profit will be distributed between token holders depends to the number of TPX token trey are possess. That is why TX token is a utility token. It will not only will represent the platform but also will work work you.  You ask: "who will be responsible for support, development, salary in this case?" Answer: " It will be still the Topex team". It is necessary to run the platform smoothly, that is why the Topex team will reserve 25% of the TPX tokens total supply.  There are many other features that will be available to TPX token holders, check out our website and whitepaper.

Author: topex.io
Title: ✅[ANN][ICO] TOPEX.IO -trading platform with profit distribution to token holders
Body: BRAND NEW CRYPTOCURRENCY EXCHANGE with 100% useful utility token   »»» PUBLIC CROWDSALE STARTS ON 19 SEP 2018 «««          »»» OFFICIAL BOUNTY THREAD «««    CRYPTOCURRENCY EXCHANGE with loss compensation and profit distribution between TPX token holders  What is Topex.io? this is an innovative multifunctional financial instrument for trading User Interface ▶️ read more ◀️ Widely customizable interface that allows you to delete or move all the items, since it's convenient for you to work as you are used to. Sorting inside elements, notifications on different blocks. You can create a completely custom interface from the various elements that you need. CryptoPortfolio ▶️ read more ◀️ The built-in cryptoportfolio in the platform will enable you to track all changes in profit, share information on purchased coins with other users without authorization. Making transactions for buying or selling all information will be recorded and displayed in your portfolio. Security ▶️ read more ◀️ The Topex.io is one of the most secure exchanges, the security of which is based on a distributed method using neural networks. It is planned to use multidimensional distributed technology of storing keys, passwords used to work with the accounts of the exchange. Money Save ▶️ read more ◀️ The economic model of Topex.io aims to reduce market risks in the trade of crypto currency and fiat money. Our exchange deals with partial or full compensation of losses in the framework of trading operations, the opening and closing of which was effected within 24 hours. Social Tools Trust management is one of the tools that allows you to partially or completely exclude your actions for buying or selling crypto currency. The system of analysis of experienced traders provides additional opportunities for proper investment. Each trader in his / her personal account can agree to track their actions for buying or selling crypto-currency assets and thereby earn TPX tokens. Trading Topex.io offers our users a set of order types to give traders the tools they need for every scenario (Limit, Market, Stop, Trailing Stop, Hidden and Topex.io Smart Order). Margin Trading, users can offer funding at the rate and duration of their choice. In addition users can use our Auto-Renew feature to renew their offers automatically upon expiry. API & Mobile Devices Stable and comfortable performance on mobile devices with API. New technology that ensures positive user experience. For added security, your mobile app can be customized with only the permissions you want to grant it. Customer service The presence of a first-class team and a thoughtful strategy of customer support with an emphasis on operational efficiency allows us to constantly support the clients at the highest level.  TOKEN SALE    ⚡️ PUBLIC CROWDSALE DATES: begins on September 19th, 12:00 UTC and lasts for 4 weeks ⚡️  1st week offers 30% Bonus: 1ETH = 5000TPX + 30% (6500TPX); 2nd week offers 20% Bonus: 1ETH = 5000TPX + 20% (6000TPX); 3rd week offers 10% Bonus: 1ETH = 5000TPX + 10% (5500TPX); 4th week without Bonus: 1ETH = 5000TPX;  Hard Cap: 20 000 ETH  Max. Token Supply: 200 000 000 TPX (100%) Max. Public Crowdsale: 140 000 000 TPX (70%) Max. Tokens Reserve: 50 000 000 TPX (25%) Max. Bounty: 10 000 000 TPX (5%) Accepted Currencies: ETH  The development of the Topex.io trading platform and client software will continue immediately after the completion of the token sale. The introduction of the beta version of the platform and the client are expected by Q1 2019.  Leadership Team   Andrey Topilskiy CEO  Andrey Orlov CTO  Dmitry Akimov CSA  Simon Menkovich CCO  Dmitry Tarakanov CMO   Other team members you can be found on the website by clicking on this link below:   Stage One ➥ 1. July - Sep 2017  The idea of creating Topex.io, the analysis of competitors, the need to create a project, the search for a team, consultations with specialists in specialized fields.  ➥ 2. Oct - Dec 2017  Apvprobation of the idea, preparation of WhitePaper, development of the economic model and its description, team approval.  ➥ 3. Jan 2018 - Mar 2018  Website development Topex.io, registration in social networks, development of personal account and the bounty program  ➥ 4. Apr - Jun 2018  Development of the project legality and search of the country with legal regulation for registration of a private company with the status of a limited liability company.  ➥ 5. Jul - Oct 2018  Announcement of the project. Advance marketing among early investors. Preparation for the ICO. Stage Two  ➥ 1. Nov 2018 - Jan 2019  Development of a full-fledged exchange platform with a minimal functional set, debugging of the system, verification of security systems.                          ➥ 2. Feb 2019 - Arp 2019  Announcement of the first beta version of the platform, with a minimum set of trading pairs, beta testing, debugging of the loss compensation system.  ➥ 3. May - Jul 2019  Release of the trading platform Topex.io, as a full-fledged financial instrument for the exchange of crypto currency.                          ➥ 4. Aug - Oct 2019  Development of social tools for traders.                          ➥ 5. Nov - Jan 2020  Development of a system for analyzing the rise or fall of prices in the crypto-currency market.                         ≪ Our goal is to change the notion of crypto-exchange markets. Given all the shortcomings of competitors, we create a truly safe, ergonomic and socially-oriented product. Our unique economic model removes all kinds of barriers when entering the crypto-currency market. Each user of the Topex.io exchange will receive additional opportunities in making a profit. ≫                           Other Languages (Links will be updated after the translation) ------------------ • Korean : • Indonesian : • Dutch : • Filipino: • Hebrew: • Japanese : • Vietnamese : • Italian : • Russian: • Arabic: • Spanish : • Romanian : • Hindi : • Greek : • Turkish: • German : • Portuguese : • Slovenian : • French: • Chinese Simplified :
